org.apache.flex.swf.io

Class SizeReportWritingSWFWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.swf.io.SWFWriter
      • org.apache.flex.swf.io.SizeReportWritingSWFWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, ISWFWriter

    public class SizeReportWritingSWFWriter
extends SWFWriter
    A class that writes a SWF and a size report. The path of the size report is passed to the constructor. When the SWF is written to disk, the size report is also written.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.apache.flex.swf.io.SWFWriter

        DEFAULT_SWF_WRITER_FACTORY, outputBuffer, tagBuffer

    • Constructor Detail

      • SizeReportWritingSWFWriter

        public SizeReportWritingSWFWriter(ISWF swf,
                          Header.Compression useCompression,
                          boolean enableDebug,
                          boolean enableTelemetry,
                          File sizeReport)
        Create a SWF writer with a size reporter.
        Parameters:
        swf - the SWF model to be encoded
        useCompression - use ZLIB compression if true
        enableDebug - enable debugging of the SWF if true
        sizeReport - the file the size report is written to.

    • Method Detail

      • getSWFWriterFactory

        public static ISWFWriterFactory getSWFWriterFactory(File sizeReport)
        Get a SWF Writer factory that can create an instance of a class that can write a SWF with the optional capability of creating a size report.
        Parameters:
        sizeReport - if non-null, return a factory for an object that can create a size report in addition to a writing a SWF. Otherwise the factory is for an object that just writes a SWF.
        Returns:
        a SWF writer factory.
